data.name: Terraformers - Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Mars explorers, rejoice! Here’s the Supporter Pack, dedicated to all the fans of Terraformers around the solar system. Thank you very much for helping us at Asteroid Lab to make this crazy game idea a reality.

In return for your support you will get:

  • Digital Artbook (after game release)
  • 4K Wallpapers
  • Game Soundtrack (will be updated as more tracks are created)
  • A Unique leader clothing style (on game release)
  • Supporter Pack on prologue will be converted in Supporter to the full game at launch
  • And more to come
data.about_the_game:
Mars explorers, rejoice! Here’s the Supporter Pack, dedicated to all the fans of Terraformers around the solar system. Thank you very much for helping us at Asteroid Lab to make this crazy game idea a reality.

In return for your support you will get:

  • A Unique leader clothing style (on game release)
  • Supporter Pack on prologue will be converted in Supporter to the full game at launch
  • And more to come
data.short_description: Including artworks, an artbook, music tracks and an exclusive skin!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: i5 3rd generation (or newer) / FX4170 (or newer)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 8000 series or newer / NVidia GTX 660 or newer

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon 5800 series
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.1
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ Desktop only
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
